data.name: Carnal Instinct
data.detailed_description:
Carnal Instinct is an Adult RPG with an emphasis on AAA quality visuals and compelling erotic interaction. Our team has over 20 years development experience and brings that formidable expertise to bear in this ambitious open-world adventure. The Steam version of the game is intended to be the most stable, and gets consistent minor updates frequently, along with a huge content update at least once every three months. The most recent of these updates added a new Dynamic Sex System, Playable Male Draconid and Female Crocodilian forms, new sex Scenes, a new quest, vast changes to the world, and more. For full details of the most recent update please click here or check the news section.



Our journey begins in a realm of ancient myth, where the life-giving waters of the Euphoris river meet the sand-swept ruins of Sabu. The God-Queen Kethra has not been seen for a thousand years, but rumors of her return are uttered in hushed tones throughout the sprawling villages along the shoreline of the once mighty waterway. Deprived of its divine empress, Sabu has fallen under the rule of eight demigods, powerful beings that once served Kethra as bodyguards. Unchecked, these immortals now vie for power as warlords, their conquest bathing Sabu with the blood of the innocent.



You enter this world as a slave, a prisoner of fate and the cruelty of others, but you will find that your future is as changeable as the sands of Sabu. The path of fate is yours to tread and your story is not yet written...



The game currently features playable Human, Feline, Jackal, Crocodilian and Draconic races on the first steps of their ascent to godhood; living echoes of the deities themselves. As your power increases and development of the project continues, so too will you be able to shape your body - from one which retains the majority of your once-human form, to the humanoid animal deities that ruled Sabu in centuries past, or finally adopt the truly primal presence of the ancient gods (Centaur, Naga, Sphynx, and more). Male, Female, and Futa options are all available in-game.



Our erotic content spans the tame foothills of vanilla lovemaking, all the way to the depraved peaks of the most extreme carnal desires. Our adult features are more than mere titillation or something to while away the hours, sex links directly into quests and vice versa. Want to improve relations or recruit an NPC to join your camp? Once our in-development camp is released, bending over or kneeling down might get you exactly where you want to be. As you begin to bend Sabu to your will so you will draw attention from those who wish to submit to your lust, or tame you to indulge their own.





Carnal Instinct contains Anthro and Human content, catering to a wide range of preferences and desires. You can enable and disable sexaul content to meet your taste, nothing is mandatory and you can choose who you decide to be intimite with and on what terms. The form into which you shape your body will dictate what options are open to you, with the more exotic forms allowing more niche sexual opportunities...
With our recent update, we have added a Dynamic Sex System, with interactive sex scenes allowing you to control the action, the camera and choosing when to climax, for more information, please check out our latest update blog.

data.short_description: Carnal Instinct is an Adult RPG with an emphasis on AAA quality visuals and compelling erotic interaction. You enter the world of Sabu a slave, but will forge your own destiny and shape the world itself in this realm of ancient gods, mythical creatures, and boundless lust.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit SP1, Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or better or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (or GTX 760 / GTX 960) or AMD Radeon HD 7970 (or R9 280x [2GB VRAM] / R9 380 / Fury X)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0c compatible sound card 5.1 with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Laptop versions of these graphics cards may work but are not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Carnal Instinct contains frequent depictions of sex acts including but not limited to fetish content, gratuitous nudity, futanari, huge insertions, bodily fluids, and more.

The narrative includes themes of a sexual nature including master/slave, suggestive content, and exploration of inner desires.

Violence in the game is limited, however combat does involve melee and ranged fighting (including blood).
